content: I am long time haskell and C++ user,. Had fun with rust on it's first years, trying to see if I can move our embedded synthesizers C++ infrastructure to rust :)

Hi all!

new member here. I work at Huawei R&D Edinburgh in the Databases team and we're using Rust for some of our work; I am sure I'll be asking dumb questions fairly soon
Feel free to ask, but Zulip is oriented towards compiler and tool developers. For general questions, you might get better answers on the Discord server.
the community discord server might be a better place for your questions :smile:
